Name: Dusk Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Fighting-type moves from damaging Dark-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Dark-type Pokémon.  You can get a Dusk Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Black Silk, a Dark Dust, and a Dark Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
